snippet: Ansley West Rivers was inspired to create a series centering on the changing life of the American river after a 25-day trip floating the Colorado through the Grand Canyon.
abstract: Ansley West Rivers was inspired to create a series centering on the changing life of the American river after a 25-day trip floating the Colorado through the Grand Canyon.
lead_paragraph: In this weekly series, T’s photo editors share the most compelling visual projects they’ve discovered.

headline.main: A Photographer’s Evocative Portraits of Rivers in Flux
